english: "i will stab him," she said aloud .
He bellowed his answer across the room .
chinese: 他从屋子那边大声地答复。

english: "how is he?" one of the fishermen shouted .
chinese: “他怎样啦？”一个打鱼的大声地问。

english: It lifted to a spasmodic sneeze and ended .
chinese: 它大声地打了一阵喷嚏，然后就结束了。

english: She sobbed aloud, not caring to restrain her grief .
chinese: 她大声地啜泣，不打算遏止悲哀。
大声地造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Only occasionally a hubbub of altercation rises to the skies .
chinese: 只是偶然发生口角，大声地吵闹。

english: An old woman rushed out of the house on fire and squalled .
chinese: 一个年老妇女从失火的房子里冲了出来大声地喊叫。

english: "and then we, who don't know the meaning of the word exhaustion, call them "idle scamps"," he said aloud .
chinese: “而我们这些不懂得耗尽体力这个字的意义的人，却把他们叫成‘懒惰的无赖，’”他大声地说。

english: She speak loudly to make everyone hear her
chinese: 她大声地讲，让每个人都可以听到她。

english: " how is he ? " one of the fishermen shouted
chinese: “他怎样啦？ ”一个打鱼的大声地问。

english: Angered at the response , he screams : " coward !
chinese: 小男孩生气了,大声地吼着"胆小鬼" 。

english: Last night he snored loudly with his mouth open
chinese: 昨天夜里他张开嘴大声地打鼾。

english: He said aloud , in a voice of awe and wonder
chinese: 他大声地说，声音肃然，带着惊奇。

english: They cheered loudly for their football team
chinese: 他们大声地为自己的足球队喊加油。

english: Angered at the response he screams " coward
chinese: 小男孩生气了，大声地吼着"胆小鬼
